api_list.description: Returns a list of work items matching the request.

optional_parameters.argument_description: Filters for work belonging to any of the provided parts
Filters for work created by any of these users

api_list.name: summarize_objects
api_list.description: Summarizes a list of objects. The logic of how to summarize a particular object type is an internal implementation detail.

api_list.name: prioritize_objects
api_list.description: Returns a list of objects sorted by priority. The logic of what constitutes priority for a given object is an internal implementation detail.

optional_parameters.argument_description: A list of objects to be prioritized

api_list.name: add_work_items_to_sprint
api_list.description: Adds the given work items to the sprint

optional_parameters.argument_description: A list of work item IDs to be added to the sprint.
The ID of the sprint to which the work items should be added

api_list.name: get_sprint_id
api_list.description: Returns the ID of the current sprint

api_list.name: get_similar_work_items
api_list.description: Returns a list of work items that are similar to the given work item

optional_parameters.argument_description: The ID of the work item for which you want to find similar items

api_list.name: search_object_by_name
api_list.description: Given a search string, returns the id of a matching object in the system of record. If multiple matches are found, it returns the one where the confidence is highest.

optional_parameters.argument_description: The search string, could be for example customerâ€™s name, part name, user name.

api_list.name: create_actionable_tasks_from_text
api_list.description: Given a text, extracts actionable insights, and creates tasks for them, which are kind of a work item.

optional_parameters.argument_description: The text from which the actionable insights need to be created.

api_list.name: who_am_i
api_list.description: Returns the ID of the current user
